code: import React from'react';import'./ProfileScreen.css';import Nav from'../HomeScreen/HomeContent/Nav';import avatar from'../../../images/Avatar.png';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{auth}from'../../../firebase';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProfileScreen=function ProfileScreen(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profileScreen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profileScreen__body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Edit Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profileScreen__info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:avatar,alt:"Avatar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profileScreen__details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:props.user.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profileScreen__plan",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Plans"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return auth.signOut();},children:"Sign Out"})]})]})]})]});};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{user:state.user};};export default connect(mapStateToProps)(ProfileScreen);
